Job description:
Position Overview
We are seeking a skilled and passionate Micro Frontend Developer to join our dynamic and innovative development team. As a Micro Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for building modular and scalable front-end components that facilitate seamless integration and collaboration across various microservices. Your expertise will be crucial in creating a cohesive and efficient user experience by combining multiple micro frontends into a cohesive application. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers, to deliver high-quality, performant, and maintainable micro frontend solutions.
Responsibilities
Micro Frontend Development: Design, develop, and maintain modular, reusable, and performant front-end components using modern web technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Angular, or Vue.js.Micro Frontend Integration: Collaborate with backend developers to integrate micro frontends with various microservices and APIs, ensuring smooth data flow and communication between the frontend and backend.Cross-Browser Compatibility: Ensure consistent user experiences across different browsers and devices by implementing responsive design principles and addressing compatibility issues.Scalability and Performance: Optimize micro frontend architecture and codebase for scalability, performance, and reusability, adhering to best practices and industry standards.Collaborative Development: Work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements, propose technical solutions, and contribute to the overall application architecture.Testing and Quality Assurance: Write unit tests and conduct thorough testing of micro frontends to ensure high-quality code and seamless functionality.Continuous Integration and Deployment: Collaborate with DevOps teams to ensure smooth CI/CD processes and frequent, reliable deployments.
Requirements
Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).Experience: Proven experience as a Frontend Developer, Frontend Engineer, or similar role with a focus on building scalable and modular frontend applications. Experience with micro frontend architecture is a plus.Technical Skills:Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+) and one or more modern frameworks/libraries (React, Angular, Vue.js, etc.). Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles. Familiarity with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, etc.). Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming. Knowledge of build tools (Webpack, Parcel, etc.) and package managers (npm, yarn). Understanding of cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization. Collaboration Skills: Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative, cross-functional team environment.Problem-Solving Abilities: Analytical mindset with a focus on problem-solving and troubleshooting to identify and resolve frontend-related issues.Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail, ensuring clean and maintainable code with a commitment to quality.
Nice-to-Have Skills
Experience with microservices architecture and backend technologies.Familiarity with containerization and container orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).Knowledge of server-side rendering (SSR) and client-side rendering (CSR) techniques.Understanding of accessibility (WCAG) standards and best practices.
Join our innovative team and play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our cutting-edge applications by implementing scalable and modular micro frontends. If you are a passionate Frontend Developer with a strong focus on micro frontend development, we encourage you to apply and be a part of our exciting journey!
Skills: Angular:Cascading Style Sheets (CSS):Front-End Development:HTML5:Industry standards:JavaScript:Microservices:Server Side:Vue.js:Web Technologies

Job description:
A world empowered by autonomy. We build robotic vehicles to improve logistics safety, forge a greener Earth, and enhance human lives.
We are a closely-knit team aspiring to change the world through disruptive technology. We are innovators. We are tinkerers. We are problem-solvers. And we have a fair amount of magic dust up our sleeves. We have a plan for fleet-level deployment of autonomous vehicles, and we are looking for the best-of-the-best to join us in making this a reality.
About Venti Technologies
Based in the U.S. and Asia, Venti Technologies is the leader in safe-speed autonomous logistics systems, developing the future of goods transportation. Using rigorous mathematics, deep learning, and theoretically-grounded algorithms, Venti has a proprietary collection of autonomy technologies including a suite of powerful logistics algorithms. Venti’s proven value proposition of saving costs, increasing vehicle utilization, and improving safety is recognized by customers and driving growth. Launched in 2018, Venti brings together an unsurpassed team internationally. The company has autonomous systems deployed in Asia for industrial and logistics sites and a growing pipeline. Venti has offices in Cambridge (Massachusetts, USA), Suzhou (China), and Singapore – our Asian headquarters.
Role responsibilities
Be part of the team to implement off-board services to support autonomous vehicle operations, including remote operations, command center, data service, simulation/re-simulation as a service. Working on both backend and frontend implementation. Interact with UI/UX designer to implement the most intuitive web applications for developers, operators, and customers. Provide common client SDK for all service backend services. 
Required Experience
Students studying in Bachelors in Computer Science, Robotics, or related fieldsFamiliarity with frontend/backend service implementationAbility to adapt and operate under ambiguityExperience with Python, Typescript, ReactJSExperience with basic deployment setup with containerFlexible problem-solver
Bonus experience
Experience with ROS or other similar middlewareExperience with data structures, object-oriented programmingExperience with real world robotics deploymentExperience in data-analysis
We also offer world-class benefits, fantastic culture, flexible working arrangements, and a great international working environment. Come and join us!

Job description:
About Capgemini:Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services. The Group is at the forefront of innovation to address the entire breadth of clients’ opportunities in the evolving world of cloud, digital and platforms. Building on its strong 50-years+ heritage and deep industry-specific expertise, Capgemini enables organizations to realize their business ambitions through an array of services from strategy to operations. Capgemini is driven by the conviction that the business value of technology comes from and through people. Today, it is a multicultural company with 360,000+ team members in almost 50+ countries. The Group reported in 2022 combined revenues of €22billion.
Required:PeopleSoft Application Developer with excellent knowledge in PeopleSoft Financials (GL/AP/AM/AR&BI).Must have excellent hands-on experience in PeopleSoft development framework like Application Designer, Application Engine, SQR, Integration Broker, BI Publisher, XML Publisher & Reporting tools.Must have excellent hands-on experience in TWS scheduler and preparing batch related configurations and able to check job status.Must have excellent hands-on experience in Unix/Linux/MS shell scripts
Let's talk about what's in it for you!
Passionate people are Capgemini's Ace of Spades - join us to discover a career that will challenge, support and inspire you. Working at Capgemini you'll find the rewards are more than just financial. You will work alongside some very smart and inspiring people on exciting projects and you will also enjoy incredible benefits. We offer flexible work practices and 40 hours of self-development every year with a huge selection of learning opportunities to choose from.
As "Architects of Positive Futures", Capgemini actively supports the community in 3 ways:
Diversity and Inclusion - we believe diversity of thought fuels excellence and innovation, which is why we positively encourage applications from suitably qualified candidates regardless of their gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, ability, intersex status or age. To support our commitment to diversity and inclusion, we celebrate special events and days of significance that are important to our employees such as Diwali, Bastille Day, Pride, IDAHOBIT, IWD and International day of people with Disabilities. Our Employee Resource Groups Women@Capgemini and OutFront support the grassroots passion of employees to drive our diversity agenda and effect change.
Digital inclusion - at Capgemini we are using our skills to drive social impact initiatives focusing on helping society address the impact of the digital and automation revolution. We also provide employees with opportunities to give back to the community through charity projects and volunteer days.
Environmental Sustainability - Capgemini joined the CDP's (Carbon Disclosure Project) prestigious "A list" for its commitment to the Net-Zero economy. We are focusing on helping our clients transform towards more sustainable business models and committing to reduce our own carbon emissions (GHG) by 20% per employee by 2020.
Recognized by Ethisphere as one of the World's Most Ethical Companies for the last 8 years in a row, ethics and values are at the heart of Capgemini's corporate culture and business. Embedded in our DNA, our seven values - Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Team Spirit, Freedom, Fun and Modesty - have remained the same since company inception in 1967. To see how we bring these values to life, click here to listen to some of our employee’s stories.
Come join us, bring your whole self to work, create new possibilities for you, your customers and your community and help us to be Architects of Positive Futures.
Capgemini Offers:Our company culture is based on 7 shared values. Honesty and trust allow collaboration; team spirit and modesty sustain it; and the resulting creative freedom and boldness lead to quality results –especially when infused with a sense of fun In addition to an interesting remuneration package, we offer you a professional and international work environment where you will work on major projects. We provide you with intense professional development and stretch you as much as needed to put your skills into action, learn and progress.

Job description:
Responsibilities

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2024. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Watch your ambitions become reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok.

About the team
TikTok and affiliates are developing the next-generation high-performance analytical database, with a mission to enable efficient and real-time data-driven decision-making on PB-level data sets. The initial product was forked from Clickhouse, after which large re-architecture had been taken place. The product now not only improves the efficiency of Clickhouse but also fits into the elastic cloud-native infrastructure with better scalability and resource utilization. With years of polishment in the internal EB-level scenarios, we are now ready to serve our business partners via various cloud vendors. 

Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.

Responsibilities
- Participate in the design and implementation of distributed databases or cloud-native systems
- Keep track, explore and delivery of the state-of-the-art data techniques in the real system, including but not limited to modern hardware, smart optimizer, data lake, and more. 

Qualifications

 - Undergraduate in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical discipline;
- Familiar with at least one programming language among C, C++, or Rust
- Experienced with data structure, algorithm, concurrent programming, I/O, operating system is essential
- Experience with at least one database. e.g., Clickhouse, Spark, Presto, Doris, Postgresql, Mysql
- Good communication, strong analytical thinking, and exceptional attention to detail.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

If you have any questions, please reach out to us at apac-earlycareers@tiktok.com.

Job description:
Singtel x Singapore Institute of Technology have embarked on a Work-Study Programme (WSP) launched in Feb 2023. The WSP is called “The Catalyst Programme” which is a structured on-the-job (OJT) development WSP that allows Polytechnic Diploma holders to secure a full-time position with Singtel while pursuing a university honours degree in Applied Computing. This programme is open to Singtel’s internal employees as well as external polytechnic diploma holders preferably from the ICT domain. Non-ICT diploma holders are encouraged to apply as well. In line with building capability in Singapore ICT sector this program will develop & groom talent over a 3-year period completing micro-credentials for each module which eventually stack-up to an honours degree in Applied Computing. Candidates will be offered a specific role as the one shared below. Are you ready for this challenge?

 Be a Part of Something BIG! 

Make an Impact by
 Analyse Module specifications work with developers to coordinate the work, track the progress of the work  Review unit test package and SIT test scenarios, tests & document test results to ensure the quality of the program  Track the end-to-end Module delivery development to SIT  End to End integration testing, system testing  Support User Acceptance Test (UAT) & implementation activities to fix the reported problems/bugs of the system to ensure the smooth execution of programs in the production environment  Work with developers to Investigate all reported problems/errors & initiate amendments & testing so that the system can operate correctly & efficiently  Prepare Review & maintain up-to-date technical documentation, flow diagrams and system documentation.  Ensure codes reviews comply with telecom security guidelines 

Requirements
 Diploma in Computer Science (or related) from a reputable Polytechnic (graduated within recent 3 years)  Able to start work on 1st October 2023  Able to code in React JS and Spring Boot 

 Your Career Growth Starts Here. Apply Now! 

 We are committed to a safe and healthy environment for our employees & customers and will require all prospective employees to be fully vaccinated.

Job description:
Company Description
Trust Wallet is the world’s most inclusive, chain-agnostic, self-custody wallet that serves tens of millions users globally. Trust Wallet provides a secure, seamless and intuitive gateway to the crypto and NFT ecosystems. Our users are able to send, receive, stake, mint and store across 4.5+ million cryptocurrencies on 66+ blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche, etc. Our developer community of different projects relies on us to reach millions of their users, build their own wallets, and grow crypto adoption.
If you’re passionate and motivated by building cloud-based microservices and highly scalable APIs, we invite you to join us to build innovative crypto architectures and advance technologies that will accelerate the delivery of web3 innovations to our users.
Job Description
System design: You will be able to think about how the services are built, communicate with each other and with third partiesFeature development and optimization: You will be owning backend features that support all our platforms (extension, mobile, and desktop)Infrastructure: You will help to define how Trust Wallet runs and deploys backend services to our millions of usersTeam building: You will be working with the team to create and foster a culture of raising the bar with each new hireInterfacing with users: You will be interfacing directly with end-users and developers building on Trust Wallet – supporting them and collecting feedback to inform the direction of the product
Qualifications
4+ years of software engineering experience, including extensive knowledge of Go (2+ years for Mid Level role)Experience building microservice-based architecturesStrong technical problem solving, communication, and collaboration skillsExperience with cloud environments like AWS, Azure, or GCPDeep knowledge of Key Value, SQL databasesExperience with containerization (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
Nice to have:
Experience in a blockchain-based projectExperience building distributed systems. Expertise in identifying and analyzing performance bottlenecksExpertise in NoSQL and/or other database storage enginesExperience building distributed systems. 
Additional Information
Why work at Trust Wallet?
Be a part of the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem that continues to grow and offers excellent career development opportunities. Work alongside diverse, world-class talent, in an environment where learning and growth opportunities are endless. Tackle fast-paced, challenging and unique projects. Work in a truly global organization, with international teams and a flat organizational structure. Enjoy competitive salary and benefits. Balance life and work with flexible working hours and casual work attire. 
Apply today to join our team in building the world’s most trusted and secure crypto wallet and enable a decentralized future for everyone.
Trust Wallet is committed to being an equal opportunity employer. We believe that having a diverse workforce is fundamental to our success.
By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice.
Skills: Cryptocurrency:Figma (Software):FinTech:Payments:Product Road Mapping:UX Research:User Experience (UX):User Personas:User-centered Design

Job Title: Senior Solution Designer - Full Stack Engineer
Job description:
At Singtel, we believe in the strength of a vibrant, diverse and inclusive workforce where backgrounds, perspectives and life experiences of our people help us innovate and create strong connections with our customers. We strive to ensure all our people practices are non-discriminatory and provide a fair, performance-based work culture that is diverse, inclusive and collaborative.

Join us and experience what it’s like to be with an Employer of Choice*. Together, let’s create a brighter digital future for all. *Awarded at the HR Fest Awards 2020.

Responsibilities
 Lead, prioritize and manage team and Cloud migration of existing apps.  Ownership and accountability of design, implementation and operations support for successful project delivery  Develop cloud migration strategies: Analyse the existing infrastructure and determine the best cloud migration strategy, considering factors such as cost, risk, and performance.  Plan and execute migration: The engineer must plan and execute the migration of on-premises applications, infrastructure, and data to the cloud. This includes managing the migration process, monitoring performance, and ensuring that data is securely transferred.  Monitor and troubleshoot: Once the migration is complete, the engineer must monitor the cloud environment to ensure that it is functioning optimally. They must also troubleshoot any issues that arise and resolve them quickly.  Collaborate with stakeholders: The engineer must work closely with stakeholders, such as application owners, system administrators, and security teams, to ensure that the cloud migration is successful.  Ensure compliance: The engineer must ensure that the cloud environment complies with industry standards, regulations, and security best practices.  Provide documentation and training: The engineer must provide documentation and training to stakeholders on how to use the new cloud-based infrastructure, applications, and data.  Continuously improve: The engineer must continuously evaluate the cloud environment and identify opportunities for improvement, such as cost savings or performance optimization.  Identify and resolve highly complex Cloud migration issues that may require establishment of new techniques, tools and processes  Proactively analyse internal and external business challenges/regulatory issues and recommend improvements  Savvy in troubleshooting complex problems and providing out of the box solutions  Resourceful in understanding issues or learning new skills  Possess excellent teamwork and able to provide clear instructions, guidance as well as knowledge sharing to the team 

Responsibilities
 Ownership and accountability of design, implementation and operations support for successful project delivery  Develop cloud migration strategies: Analyse the existing infrastructure and determine the best cloud migration strategy, considering factors such as cost, risk, and performance. Identify and resolve highly complex Cloud migration issues that may require establishment of new techniques, tools and processes  Proactively analyse internal and external business challenges/regulatory issues and recommend improvements  Savvy in troubleshooting complex problems and providing out of the box solutions  Resourceful in understanding issues or learning new skills  Possess excellent teamwork and able to provide clear instructions, guidance as well as knowledge sharing to the team  May require to be on standby or on-call after office hours, weekends and public holidays based on the requirement for operational or meeting deadlines for implementation projects 

The Ideal Candidate Should Possess
 Bachelor in Computer Science, Electrical/Computer Engineer, Information Technology or related discipline  Has minimally 9+ years’ experience in designing/implementation/consulting of large-scale private/public/hybrid cloud migration projects.  The candidate should have attained professional certifications at least in one of the following areas with at least 5+ years of implementation experience in: Azure/AWS/Google Cloud/VMware. Strong working knowledge and ability to apply architecture concepts, frameworks and methodologies to projects  Experienced in business and technical analysis, architecture design, project management  Possess hands-on experience and excellent technical skills and proven track records in migration and/or emerging IT technologies engineering in the following area: Platform, storage, database and virtualization, Cloud infrastructure (IaaS/PaaS),Container technologies like Redhat OCP, Dockers, Kubernetes and Azure AKS  Possess hands-on experience with Web and server technologies including Virtualization, Web services, EAI, with implementation of JAVA,J2EE,.NET and SOA concept in a distributed environment on Windows and Linux  Possess hands-on experience in implementing projects with Oracle, MSSQL,MYSQL and Postgres SQL databases. No SQL DB knowledge is an advantage.  Experience in delivering database transformation projects will be an added advantage  Ability to communicate IT architecture methods, concepts, standards and policies in a simplified manner. Work Experience 9+ years

Azure Network and Architect certification.

Company Name: AC P. COMPUTER TRAINING & CONSULTANCY PTE LTD
Job description:
We are a team that seeks to design and develop software applications to better serve the needs. To that end, we employ an agile approach towards development and work towards adopting the best practices and tools used in the top technology companies and organizations. We are now looking for a top-notch Software Developer in
the Lead role to join us in this mission.
What To Expect
As a Software Engineering Technical Lead, you will play a critical role in leading a team of talented software
engineers in designing, developing, and delivering high-quality software products. Outside of your own engineering team, you will need to work alongside other Tech Leads and closely with cross-functional teams, including Product Managers, Designers, and QA Engineers, to shape and execute the technical vision of our projects. The ideal candidate will have a passion for technology, a deep understanding of Agile principles, and the ability to mentor and guide team members to reach their full potential. You will be working within a highly motivated agile development team to deliver high-quality software applications according to requirements.
This May Include
Web application front-endsWeb application/API back-endsAutomation scripts
There will also be opportunities to explore areas beyond software development, such as devops, cloud
infrastructure, software QA.
Are you the one? If so, you will be entrusted to…
Lead and mentor a team of software engineers, fostering a culture of excellence, innovation, and
collaboration.
Collaborate with Product Managers to define project scope, technical requirements, and realistic timelines.Work closely with designers and developers to ensure seamless integration of user interfaces and back-end
functionality.
Champion Agile methodologies, ensuring the team adheres to Scrum or Kanban practices, holding regular
stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
Drive technical decision-making processes, advocating for best practices, code quality, and scalability.Adopting proven software engineering practices like pair programming, code reviews, test-driven
development to maintain high coding standards, identifying potential issues and suggesting improvements.
Balance hands-on coding with leadership responsibilities, taking on technical challenges when necessary.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify potential roadblocks, risks, and mitigations, ensuring
successful project delivery.
Stay updated with the latest technology trends, tools, and frameworks, and proactively suggest improvements
to existing systems.
Promote a culture of innovation, encouraging experimentation, and supporting creative problem-solving
approaches.
Requirements
A minimum of 3-5 years relevant working experience, of which at least 1 year in managing a team is preferred.Experience in modern web application technologies such as React, Typescript (FE), Nodejs (BE),
Postgresql (BE), TypeORM (BE), and Typescript (BE) are required.
Experience in Nextjs, and RoR (Ruby on Rails) is good to have.
Experience In The Following Would Be Advantageous
Agile processes/practices (e.g. Scrum, Extreme Programming)Continuous integration/continuous deploymentDocker/container technologyKubernetes along with docker and containerPostgresqlCloud/PaaS platforms, such as AWS/Heroku/OpenShiftServerless FrameworkPreferred character/personality traits:Has high expectations of selfKeen to share knowledge with team matesStrong communication skillsDetail orientedCurious, open to new ideasQuick to learn new skillsSelf-driven and independentStrong sense of initiative

Industries: IT Services and IT Consulting:Software Development:Financial Services
Job description:
About Capgemini: Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services. The Group is at the forefront of innovation to address the entire breadth of clients’ opportunities in the evolving world of cloud, digital and platforms. Building on its strong 50-years+ heritage and deep industry-specific expertise, Capgemini enables organizations to realize their business ambitions through an array of services from strategy to operations. Capgemini is driven by the conviction that the business value of technology comes from and through people. Today, it is a multicultural company with 360,000+ team members in almost 50+ countries. The Group reported in 2022 combined revenues of €22billion
Position Overview:
Are you a master of code with a passion for crafting digital wonders in the cloud? Are you ready to lead and shape the future of our software development team? If you have 6 or more years of software development experience and a deep understanding of Python, OOP concepts, CI/CD magic with Jenkins, Linux sorcery, SQL wizardry, and cloud-native enchantments like OpenShift and Kubernetes, then we invite you to embark on this magical journey with us.
Qualifications:
Minimum 6 years of software development experience, with a proven track record of enchanting code.Proficiency in Python and a deep understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts.Experience and expertise in the magical realms of CI/CD, specifically with Jenkins.Command of the Linux kingdom, with hands-on experience.Proficiency in the language of SQL, with the ability to craft complex queries.Adeptness in cloud-native technologies, including OpenShift and Kubernetes.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively.Excellent communication skills and a collaborative spirit.
What We Offer:
A spellbinding work environment that fosters creativity and innovation.The opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects that shape the future.A dynamic team of like-minded conjurers who believe in the power of technology to transform the world.
Let's talk about what's in it for you!
Passionate people are Capgemini's Ace of Spades - join us to discover a career that will challenge, support and inspire you. Working at Capgemini you'll find the rewards are more than just financial. You will work alongside some very smart and inspiring people on exciting projects and you will also enjoy incredible benefits. We offer flexible work practices and 40 hours of self-development every year with a huge selection of learning opportunities to choose from.
As "Architects of Positive Futures", Capgemini actively supports the community in 3 ways:
Diversity and Inclusion - we believe diversity of thought fuels excellence and innovation, which is why we positively encourage applications from suitably qualified candidates regardless of their gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, ability, intersex status or age. To support our commitment to diversity and inclusion, we celebrate special events and days of significance that are important to our employees such as Diwali, Bastille Day, Pride, IDAHOBIT, IWD and International day of people with Disabilities. Our Employee Resource Groups Women@Capgemini and OutFront support the grassroots passion of employees to drive our diversity agenda and effect change.
Digital inclusion - at Capgemini we are using our skills to drive social impact initiatives focusing on helping society address the impact of the digital and automation revolution. We also provide employees with opportunities to give back to the community through charity projects and volunteer days.
Environmental Sustainability - Capgemini joined the CDP's (Carbon Disclosure Project) prestigious "A list" for its commitment to the Net-Zero economy. We are focusing on helping our clients transform towards more sustainable business models and committing to reduce our own carbon emissions (GHG) by 20% per employee by 2020.
Recognized by Ethisphere as one of the World's Most Ethical Companies for the last 8 years in a row, ethics and values are at the heart of Capgemini's corporate culture and business. Embedded in our DNA, our seven values - Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Team Spirit, Freedom, Fun and Modesty - have remained the same since company inception in 1967. To see how we bring these values to life, click here to listen to some of our employee’s stories.
Come join us, bring your whole self to work, create new possibilities for you, your customers and your community and help us to be Architects of Positive Futures.
Capgemini Offers:Our company culture is based on 7 shared values. Honesty and trust allow collaboration; team spirit and modesty sustain it; and the resulting creative freedom and boldness lead to quality results –especially when infused with a sense of fun In addition to an interesting remuneration package, we offer you a professional and international work environment where you will work on major projects. We provide you with intense professional development and stretch you as much as needed to put your skills into action, learn and progress.
Skills: Continuous Delivery (CD):Continuous Integration (CI):Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD):Jenkins:Kubernetes:Linux:Object-Oriented Programming (OOP):OpenShift:Python (Programming Language):SQL:Software Development

Job description:
About Aureus GroupEstablished in September 2013, Aureus Academy is Singapore’s leading music school with over 18,000 students enrolled in our school. Aureus Academy specializes in providing individually tailored piano lessons, violin lessons, drum lessons, voice lessons, and more to students of all ages and abilities.
Aureus has transformed a traditional brick-and-mortar service into a cutting-edge business featured in Forbes, Business Times, Straits Times, and Channel News Asia. Aureus Group, the parent company of Aureus Academy, has been ranked 4th in the “Singapore’s Fastest Growing Companies” survey conducted by The Straits Times and Germany-based global research firm Statista.
Company Mission/VisionThe Aureus Group’s Mission/Vision is to become the undisputed leader of Creative Arts Education globally by Sep 2025 and to make Aureus the first brand/activity of choice in any market or segment we operate in.
About the RoleWe are looking for outstanding Mobile Developers with experience in developing both iOS and Android applications on Flutter.
Job Responsibilities:Write structured, testable, and efficient code by using the best software development practicesWork with UI/UX designers to execute designs and ensure they are feasible for developmentPlan and execute User Acceptance Tests with a combination of end-users and internal project teams membersStay up to date with emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them to operations and activitiesCooperate with back-end developers to ensure apps are aligned
Hiring Criteria:Possesses at least a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related fieldAt least 2-3 years of working experience as an app developerHigh level of programming skills and in-depth knowledge of Swift/Kotlin and FlutterHas experience with integrating rest APIsProven technical knowledge in mobile app developmentExperience with App Store / Play store submission, subscription management, and reportingStrong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelinesKnowledge of Git and experience in using GitHub
Perks and Packages: Gross Salary of $5,000 - $6,500Medical and Insurance CoverageWorklife and Wellness including 14 days of Annual Leaves and Sick LeavesIn-House Learning, Development, and Training are providedProfessional Career Development OpportunitiesComplimentary Music LessonsVibrant and Supportive Company CultureWork Equipment including IT Devices and Digital Software is provided

Job description:
At Singtel, we believe in the strength of a vibrant, diverse and inclusive workforce where backgrounds, perspectives and life experiences of our people help us innovate and create strong connections with our customers. We strive to ensure all our people practices are non-discriminatory and provide a fair, performance-based work culture that is diverse, inclusive and collaborative.

Join us and experience what it’s like to be with an Employer of Choice*. Together, let’s create a brighter digital future for all. *Awarded at the HR Fest Awards 2020.

Singtel Is Building a Unique Enterprise Platform Completely Homegrown And In This Position You Will Work With Platforms Product Team, To

We are seeking for a hands-on full stack developer, who will be part of the software development team of the Group Enterprise platforms product house, contributing on the software development for Singtel Enterprise platform and application suite.  Build the enterprise platform in a completely scalable fashion that can process millions of messages concurrently.  Contribute to designing and developing the platform in an infrastructure agnostic fashion so that the platform can work with any network backend in a plug and play fashion.  Bring in your experience in building scalable and repeatable platforms to make every component of the platform modular by design with industry grade security.  Design and implement RESTful APIs to expose platform features as microservices.  Build and deploy performant modern web applications in React, Redux, Webpack, ES6, and Flow  Architect efficient and scalable backend systems  Write unit, functional and end-to-end tests for the platform  Write high-quality code (Ruby on Rails, Go, Java etc) that communicates with upstream backend services via HTTP APIs  Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues  Participate in code reviews  In depth understanding of the whole web stack, web protocols, and web performance optimisation techniques  In-depth understanding of web frameworks (such as Rails, Django, Spring etc)  Detailed knowledge of minimum one modern JavaScript framework: React, Ember, Angular, etc  Proficient understanding of the HTTP protocol  In depth knowledge of Relational, No-SQL databases, and message queues/brokers  Understand at least one backend MVC framework - Java and Spring Boot are strongly preferred  Build micro-services and understand different patterns to approach the designs.  Worked on cloud platforms preferably PCF and used tools such as Docker.  Experience in designing and delivering APIs and security models  Excellent understanding of Message queue systems (Kafka)  Monitoring and logging tools (ELK, Splunk)  Front-end frameworks (React, Vue JS, Bootstrap, jQuery)  Web app frameworks (Django, Drupal etc.)  Databases and storage/caching (Postgres, MongoDB, Redis)  Contribute to software development and associated new technology selection and adoption. Focus areas include developing API driven features on big data, machine learning, auto scaling micro-services, scalable data storage/retrieval.  Work on architecture and software development across platform components like customer onboarding, data management, application lifecycle etc  Participate on design of common platform functionality, and consistent, best-practice platform and application design.  Adopt industry standard coding practises to develop the platform to ensure scalability, security and stability  Participate on the move to a full SaaS deployment and management  Collaborate with Business development and partnership team to develop integration adapters for third party technology and applications.  Participate in technical partnership conversations and due diligence. 
What we’re looking for...

You embrace failure for the learning it provides. You can inspire and motivate others to deliver your vision. You view obstacles as puzzles to be solved. You are driven by the desire to delight your ultimate client, the customer
 Java (J2EE and J2SE 1.8 or higher) and Python, additional knowledge on Scala would be advantageous  HTML, CSS, Drupal, Bootstrap, Angular, JQuery, additional knowledge on Reactjs would be advantageos.  Cassandra, MongoDB and Elasticsearch (At least 2). SQL databases like Postgres, MySQL  Experience in source code management and build - GIT, Maven, Ant  Experience in Scrum - JIRA, Confluence  Experience in Messaging - Kafka, Any Pub/Sub library  Experience in containerization – Docker, Jenkins  Experience in Scalable deployment – Kubernetes  Experience in Learning Libraries - MLib, DL4J, H20, Tensorflow  Experience in Big data Platforms - Spark (Core and Streaming) or Hadoop  Experience in File Systems – HDFS  Experience in Integration methods - REST API’s, messaging, WSDL, SDK’s  Experience in API documents - Swagger or similar  Experience developing complex, enterprise grade, configurable, scalable software products.  A background in systems level thinking and design. Combined with the ability to translate technical strategy and architectures into concrete, minimal viable products, with the right tradeoffs and phasing.  Broad and deep knowledge of relevant technologies, including messaging, relational and NoSQL databases, data modelling, analytics, IoT, and interfaces. Job description:
Vega Solutions | Singapore, Remote

Welcome to our dynamic web3 venture builder. Based in Singapore, we are a passionate team of founders, developers, creatives, and builders, united by a shared mission to lead in the latest industry trends. Join us as we incubate groundbreaking projects and provide invaluable knowledge, guiding the next generation of web3 pioneers. Together, we will shape the decentralized future while fostering an environment that nurtures every project's success.

Position Summary

We are seeking an accomplished and motivated Frontend Developer to play a pivotal role in a new incubation project working on building an innovative NFT derivatives exchange platform. As a Frontend Developer, you will be instrumental in designing and implementing user interfaces that empower traders to engage with NFT derivatives seamlessly. You will collaborate closely with our design, backend, and blockchain teams to deliver exceptional user experiences and ensure the platform's performance, responsiveness, and scalability.

Job Responsibilities
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and backend developers to understand project requirements and translate them into intuitive frontend solutions.Develop high-quality, reusable code for the NFT derivatives exchange platform, leveraging modern frontend technologies such as React, Redux, and Web3.js.Design and implement user interfaces that provide an exceptional trading experience for NFT derivatives, encompassing features like trading dashboards, order books, and portfolio management.Ensure the platform's optimal performance, scalability, and responsiveness across various devices and browsers, with a strong emphasis on user-centric design.Participate actively in code reviews to maintain code quality, share knowledge, and offer constructive feedback to fellow team members.Stay updated with the latest industry trends, emerging frontend technologies, and best practices for seamless integration of blockchain components.Collaborate closely with the blockchain team to integrate Web3 functionalities, guaranteeing secure and efficient interactions with the underlying blockchain infrastructure.Identify and address frontend-related issues promptly, working towards effective resolutions to uphold an excellent user experience.Contribute insights and ideas to improve the overall development process, advocating for innovation and efficiency.
Job Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.Proven track record as a Frontend Developer, supported by a portfolio showcasing projects developed using React, Redux, and other contemporary frontend technologies.Familiarity with blockchain technology, particularly Ethereum, and hands-on experience integrating Web3.js or equivalent libraries into frontend applications.Proficiency in responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility issues.Strong grasp of version control systems, specifically Git.Experience working within Agile development environments, demonstrating a sense of ownership and the ability to contribute both independently and collaboratively.Effective communication skills, enabling clear articulation of technical concepts to both technical and non-technical team members.Keen eye for design aesthetics and a passion for delivering visually pleasing and user-friendly interfaces.Knowledge of cryptocurrency trading, NFTs, and derivatives trading is advantageous

Job Title: Software Mobile Application Developer, SPPD - Contract
Industries: Government Administration:Government Relations Services:International Trade and Development
Job description:
What The Role Is

The Strategic Planning and Policy Division (SPPD) in the Ministry of Law oversees the ministry’s (i) strategic planning process, (ii) transformation efforts, (iii) data governance, policy and standards and data analytics capabilities, and (iv) development and review of policies relating to community legal services. While officers are hired for specific roles within the division at the start, officers have the opportunity to work in different or multiple sections within the division, taking into consideration the officers’ competencies and development needs, as well as the needs of the division.

Key Areas Of Work Include

The Transformation Office coordinates and drives public sector transformation efforts within the Ministry and support transformation efforts in the wider legal ecosystem, in line with WOG initiatives.

(i) Digitalisation – Ensuring that the ministry becomes digital to the core, while serving with a heart.

(ii) Service Delivery – Providing citizen-centric services.

(iii) Workforce and Workplace Transformation – Developing adaptable and future-ready officers supported by a progressive and caring ministry.

(iv) Citizen Engagement – Partnering Singaporeans to co-develop and co-deliver policies and programmes.

(v) Organisation Development and Excellence – Enabling and tracking the ministry’s success.

What You Will Be Working On

The officer will assist partner Divisions in technical design, implementation and testing of new digital solutions (mainly on the frontend) for innovative digital projects within the Ministry, using tools such as agile development on mobile and Cloud. The officer will be tasked to produce compelling designs to illustrate concepts iteratively and be able to provide detailed specifications for software developers. Key responsibilities include:

(i) Facilitating discussions with partner Divisions to understand their digital needs.

(ii) Design planning, conducting market research, generating ideas from the project teams and translating these ideas into story boards, wireframes or prototypes for existing and/or new applications.

(iii) Leading the design for web and/ or mobile applications.

(iv) Working together with project teams and relevant stakeholders on design decisions to transform the Ministry’s digital experiences while following existing government policies, existing guidelines, and industry best practices.

(v) Any other IT-related tasks and other ad-hoc duties to support smooth business operations.

Candidates Should

What we are looking for
 Possess academic training in Computer Science or equivalent experience in a related field Possess some experience in IT solution implementation and common programming languages e.g. C++, Java/Javascript, Ruby and Python etc. Have some knowledge and/or experience in User Centred Design (UCD), frontend development and mobile app development. Have knowledge in creating experience maps, user journeys and service blueprints, interaction models, flows and wireframes. Be able to work with project teams (non-technical) and the frontend IT team to create prototypes/ proof-of-concepts for their various project needs. Possess strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate as a team-player with cross-functional, multi-disciplinary teams. Be a fast learner, self-motivated, innovative, empathetic, resourceful, creative and have a positive attitude.

Having knowledge and experience on public cloud (e.g. AWS, Azure and GitLab) as well as possessing a portfolio showcasing different digital prototypes that you have designed before, will be an advantage.

Successful candidates will be appointed on a 1-year contract in the first instance, subject to annual renewal.
Skills: Attitude Change:Computer Science:Front-End Development:Mobile Application Development:Mobile Applications:Performance Motivation:Project Teams:UCP:User Journeys:Wireframing

Job description:
Responsibilities
About ByteDance
Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.
Why Join Us
At ByteDance, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for millions of users across all of our products. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at ByteDance.
About The Team
Our team is committed to building comprehensive gaming security systems to cover and solve various security risks in the entire lifecycle of game development and operation. Rooted from years of experience in fighting underground hackers, we offer professional products, solutions and services to create excellent gaming experience for our players.

 Responsible for the design, development, and operation of backend systems related to game security. Responsible for the design and implementation of game security platforms such as content security/threat intelligent alarm platforms.

Proficient in at least one language, such as Go, C/C++, or Python. Practical experience and in-depth understanding of popular projects, such as MySQL, Redis, and Kafka. Familiar with web development, with in-depth understanding of at least one web framework, such as React. Experienced on development on high availability and high reuse of systems or concurrent services. Having practical experience in security products is a plus.
ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Job description:
Role Summary
The Enterprise Platforms & Security (EP&S) team delivers the following capabilities for Pfizer. Business application platforms supporting Pfizer’s enterprise application and critical business processes. Infrastructure allowing business traffic to travel where it needs to go, internally and externally, along with the appropriate access controls. EP&S secures Pfizer's most important information assets through world class controls and protections and enables Pfizer's business results by making security an enabler and not a roadblock to achieving business results.
This is an opportunity to join a team that innovates every day on technologies in support of scientific discovery, breakthrough products, and essential partnerships that help change patients’ lives.
Our Culture
Our Culture in Pfizeris hugely important to us. We recognize that people are the cornerstone of Pfizer’s success. We embrace career development & colleague engagement. As a team, together we run our business, so your input and expertise are essential to our success! We are proud of our ongoing efforts to foster diversity & inclusion to ensure all colleagues have the freedom to be who they are and to bring their whole self to work.
Our culture is founded on the pillars of Equity, Joy, Courage and Excellence.
As a Sr. Associate, Full Stack Network Engineer, you will perform day to day full-stack support functions related to Pfizer enterprise telecommunications (data & wireless) network. You will be a technical member of a team using appropriate development methodologies (agile, waterfall, hybrid, etc.) to provide continuous delivery of solutions. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the technology stack as we continue to push technology forward. You will be responsible for delivering high quality network solutions, including requirements gathering from various stakeholders to provide solutions with network configurations across various forms of network technologies – Wide Area, Local Area, Wireless, DDI, Load Balancing, Tools, and Automation. This role requires strong collaboration skills, the ability to work independently with a focus on high quality and a strong sense of accountability. The role also requires a strong desire for continuous learning to stay current with the rapidly evolving global technology landscape and significant attention to detail and quality.
Role Responsibilities
Gather requirements, engineer solutions, and deploy Network Solutions to meet the needs of our business clients. Develop, deploy, maintain, and improve new and existing network solutions in accordance with design standards and change management procedures, remaining compliant with documentation standardsSupporting new technology deployments by designing networks with the intention of adopting automationOversee network equipment deployment in accordance with network implementation standards and design principlesFunction as an escalation point for solutioning and troubleshooting complex incidentsHelp the team embrace agile core values, adopt, and apply those principles, and implementation practices. 
Basic Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in a technical field or equivalent practical experience3+ years of network operations or engineering experienceAssociate level Industry certifications (CCNA, DEVASC, CCSA, or equivalent expertise)Demonstrated ability to effectively document network designs and communicate implementation details
Preferred QualificationsExperience with design, implementation, troubleshooting global networksExperience in any of the following:Cisco/Meraki/Aruba technologies – Viptela, Catalyst, Nexus, AireOSDDI SolutionsF5 or A10 Load BalancersProfessional level Industry certifications (CCNP, CCSE, CISSP, or equivalent expertise)Familiarity and/or previous experience with Agile (e.g., Scrum) is desired
Work Location Assignment: Flexible
Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.

Job description:
Responsibilities

 TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

TikTok Lead Ads team is responsible for building lead generation solutions that enable businesses to create seamless interactions with their customers while ensuring our community feels comfortable and safe on the platform. This team aims to provide intuitive, simplified solutions that grow advertiser activation, retention and ARPA via enhanced delivery experience, performance and higher ROI.

Our team owns the end-to-end stack for lead ads, including customer and user experience, ads ranking and delivery, leads management as well as CRM ecosystem. We are looking for software engineers who are excited to grow their business understanding, build highly scalable and reliable systems, partner across functions with global teams, and make big impacts.

Responsibilities:
- Responsible for the development of scalable and reliable systems aligned with product targets and requirements.
- Build solutions within areas of lead ads management, CRM integration and ecosystem to lay the foundation of lead ads growth.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define products and drive initiatives from an engineering perspective. 

Qualifications

Job Title: Backend Software Engineer (Server Application Performance Monitoring) - Developer Infrastructure
Job description:
Responsibilities

 About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate, and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make an impact happen with a career at TikTok.

The Observability Infrastructure Team is responsible for (1) an in-house developed time-series database, time-series warehouse, distributed tracing, and logging systems (2) a one-stop observability platform including application monitoring, customized dashboard, intelligent alarm, problem diagnosis, and remediation, tracing topology analysis, in order to guarantee production service stability, capacity management, and service governance capabilities.

What you will be doing:
1. Design, build, and maintain scalable data infrastructures and pipelines.
2. Design data models and extract the information and signals from observability data for internal observability functionalities (e.g. reporting, root cause analysis).
3. Work closely with product managers to deliver industry-leading observability products.
4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists and software engineers, to understand data requirements and implement effective solutions. 

Qualifications

 What you should have:
1. Bachelor or Master's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field
2. At least 3 years in software engineering and 2 years of relevant experience in data engineering
3. Experience in Big Data technologies(Hadoop, M/R, Hive, Spark, Kafka, ClickHouse, Flink etc.)
4. Skilled in SQL and at least one programming language of Go, Java, Scala, Python
5. Experience in performing data analysis, data ingestion, and data integration 
6. Solid communication and collaboration skills

Job description:
At Singtel, we believe in the strength of a vibrant, diverse and inclusive workforce where backgrounds, perspectives and life experiences of our people help us innovate and create strong connections with our customers. We strive to ensure all our people practices are non-discriminatory and provide a fair, performance-based work culture that is diverse, inclusive and collaborative.

Join us and experience what it’s like to be with an Employer of Choice*. Together, let’s create a brighter digital future for all. *Awarded at the HR Fest Awards 2020.

At Singtel, we're working on projects that push the boundaries of digital, realising our vision and purpose to Empower Every Generation. We have a dynamic and diverse team, with a passion for innovation, and talent to deliver cutting-edge digital solutions and immersive customer experience.

In Group IT, we create great technology that can change the future, and we're looking for people to be part of our digital and 5G journey. If you like to work in a dynamic, leading communications technology group to deliver innovations and excellence across the region, come join our digital, software engineering, data and cyber security teams!

Apply now, and ignite our digital future together.

Responsibilities
 Lead, prioritize and manage team and Cloud migration of existing apps.  Ownership and accountability of design, implementation and operations support for successful project delivery  Develop cloud migration strategies: Analyse the existing infrastructure and determine the best cloud migration strategy, considering factors such as cost, risk, and performance.  Plan and execute migration: The engineer must plan and execute the migration of on-premises applications, infrastructure, and data to the cloud. This includes managing the migration process, monitoring performance, and ensuring that data is securely transferred.  Monitor and troubleshoot: Once the migration is complete, the engineer must monitor the cloud environment to ensure that it is functioning optimally. They must also troubleshoot any issues that arise and resolve them quickly.  Collaborate with stakeholders: The engineer must work closely with stakeholders, such as application owners, system administrators, and security teams, to ensure that the cloud migration is successful.  Ensure compliance: The engineer must ensure that the cloud environment complies with industry standards, regulations, and security best practices.  Provide documentation and training: The engineer must provide documentation and training to stakeholders on how to use the new cloud-based infrastructure, applications, and data.  Continuously improve: The engineer must continuously evaluate the cloud environment and identify opportunities for improvement, such as cost savings or performance optimization.  Identify and resolve highly complex Cloud migration issues that may require establishment of new techniques, tools and processes  Proactively analyse internal and external business challenges/regulatory issues and recommend improvements  Savvy in troubleshooting complex problems and providing out of the box solutions  Resourceful in understanding issues or learning new skills  Possess excellent teamwork and able to provide clear instructions, guidance as well as knowledge sharing to the team  May require to be on standby or on-call after office hours, weekends and public holidays based on the requirement for operational or meeting deadlines for implementation projects 

The Ideal Candidate Should Possess
 Bachelor in Computer Science, Electrical/Computer Engineer, Information Technology or related discipline  Has minimally 15+ years’ experience in designing/implementation/consulting of large-scale private/public/hybrid cloud migration projects.  The candidate should have attained professional certifications at least in one of the following areas with at least 8+ years of implementation experience in: Azure/AWS/Google Cloud/VMware.  Azure certification is preferred  Experience in multi-tiered architecture, design and implementation  Significant implementation experience of DevOps techniques and Agile practices.  Strong working knowledge and ability to apply architecture concepts, frameworks and methodologies to projects  Experienced in business and technical analysis, architecture design, project management  Possess hands-on experience and excellent technical skills with proven track records in migration and/or emerging IT technologies engineering in the following area: Platform, storage, database and virtualization, Cloud infrastructure (IaaS/PaaS),Container technologies like Redhat OCP, Dockers, Kubernetes and Azure AKS  Possess hands-on experience with Web and server technologies including Virtualization, Web services, EAI, with implementation of JAVA,J2EE,.NET and SOA concept in a distributed environment on Windows and Linux  Possess hands-on experience in implementing projects with Oracle, MSSQL,MYSQL and Postgres SQL databases. No SQL DB knowledge is an advantage.  Experience in delivering database transformation projects will be an added advantage  Ability to communicate IT architecture methods, concepts, standards and policies in a simplified manner.  PMP, ITIL and TOGAF certification is an added advantage  Good written and verbal communication and presentation skills, able to interact professionally with all levels of the organization  Telecom background preferred 

Responsibilities
 Lead, prioritize and manage Cloud migration of existing apps and effectively provide implementation and operations support to projects in order to meet or exceed SLA  Possess hands-on experience and good technical skills with proven track records in migration and/or emerging IT technologies engineering in the following area: Platform, storage, database and virtualization, Cloud infrastructure (IaaS/PaaS), Container technologies like Redhat OCP, Dockers, Kubernetes and AWS ECS  Possess hands-on experience with Web and server technologies including Virtualization, Web services, EAI, with implementation of JAVA, J2EE,.NET and SOA concept in a distributed environment on Windows and Linux.  Possess hands-on experience with databases such as Oracle,MSSQL,MYSQL and Postgres SQL databases. No SQL DB knowledge is an advantage.  Successful implementation of DevOps techniques and Agile practices.

Job description:

Our Singapore-based Information Systems Asia Pacific (ISAP) center is a vital hub for our worldwide operations, serving as a key contributor to our strategic initiatives. We are committed to innovation, agility, and delivering sustainable competitive advantages through cutting-edge technology solutions.
Position Overview:
In this challenging and diverse role, we are seeking a Senior Java Developer to join our Core Banking IT department.This department is responsible for the development and maintenance of the International Back Office Cash Management System, a critical component deployed across 25 business units globally.The system encompasses various modules, including reference data management, commercial back-office functions, accounting, and credit risk monitoring.As a Senior Java Developer, you will work collaboratively within a team comprising Business Analysts, Project Managers, Technical Leads, and co-developers to implement new solutions and enhance our cash management system.

Actively participate in the analysis and resolution of production issues, providing technical support when needed.Qualifications and Profile:
To excel in this role, you should possess the following qualifications and attributes:
Functional:
A minimum of 8+ years of relevant experience in Java-J2EE software engineering, ideally within the banking sector. Knowledge of the financial and banking industry is a plus.Familiarity with Cash Management systems is a strong advantage.
Technical:
Minimum 8+ years of experience in web and stand-alone application design & development using Java/JEE technologies within a Unix environment. Excellent understanding and practical experience with Spring Frameworks (IOC, Spring Boot, Spring Batch, Spring Integration, Spring Security, etc.).Proficiency in Docker, CI/CD, and Kubernetes. Strong knowledge and practical experience of Microservices architecture. Familiarity with Jenkins, Maven, and Master Deploy.Proficiency in source code management tools such as Git and SVN. Excellent knowledge of messaging systems like WebSphere MQ and HornetQ. Practical experience with JavaScript technologies such as Angular 5/6, VueJs, Aurelia/Durandal, or ReactJS.Experience working with application servers like Jboss, Jetty, and WebSphere. Strong solution design skills, including the use of proven patterns and an awareness of anti-patterns, as well as performance tuning expertise.
Other Professional Skills and Mindset:Strong organizational and communication skills. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities. Team player who enjoys explaining and sharing knowledge.Awareness of various software development procedures. Willingness to work on new and innovative solutions collaboratively.Proactive and able to follow defined procedures. Understanding and respect for cultural diversity.If you are an innovative and agile professional looking to contribute to ambitious technological challenges in a multicultural environment, we encourage you to apply.Join us in shaping the future of banking technology and driving sustainable competitive advantages for our organization.

“At LiquidX we invest in the greatest NFT projects, helping founders to deliver the highest utilities to their communities, backing the projects' success with strong financials and the right team.
We are based in Singapore and Malaysia with many of our team collaborating remotely from countries like New Zealand, Indonesia, and Brazil. Having recently raised a large amount in funding, we aim to create long term value for NFT holders, by building unique gaming and community experiences, combining superior graphics and storylines with top notch blockchain technologies.”
What You Can Expect To Work On
With Tech Lead, work closely with project co founders, experts in the field, product and marketing team to deliver projects from inception to productionBootstrap applications such as DAO platforms, workflow engine and generative AI technologies to explore business opportunities in legal, gaming, finance, education or other industriesIntegrate a wide range of services and low code tools such as Webflow, Retool, n8n to build prototypes rapidly so as to check on feasibility and identify business valuesMentor junior software engineers and facilitate agile development processDesign robust, cost-effective architecture with deep understanding of trade-offs in systemsUnderstand maintenance and cost Implication of infrastructure and able to perform basic DevOps tasksIdentify bottleneck and optimise workflows for the team from product requirements to continuous delivery systems
Requirements
3-5+ years of experience with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related fieldDemonstrable experience of shipping a product with strong alignment in impact and businessTake ownership of entire features from specification to delivery as an individual contributorSelf-motivated and work effectively remotely and with a high degree of autonomy, within a collaboratively minded teamKeen interest in Web3 from NFT, De-FI to DAOs, be curious and learn quickly to navigate across different industries and projects in this rapidly evolving spaceBroad experience across various systems, products and industries, past journeys as early members in a startup will be a plus Understand maintenance and cost Implication of infrastructure and able to perform basic DevOps tasksExperience in developing smart contract, solidity and tooling such as hardhat or foundry will be a plusAble to think in first principles to drive innovation in web3 with understanding in trust, censorship resistance, consensus mechanisms and motivation of various technologiesKnowledge in basic principles of security such as defence in depth and adopt common security practices and tools in systems design
Benefits
We Listen. Your voice, ideas, and suggestions matters to us, as we continuously evolve Our People. You’ll be working with a diverse, multicultural, international, talented, fun, supportive, and innovative people and teams. We are people you can be proud to work withOn The Edge of Innovation. Working on the latest technological, social and financial trends that is web3 and blockchainFlat Organisation. our team is a community, we work together as a team from all levels in true decentralised spirit
